column4: Odd... Ive added "deb http://kanotix.com/files/debian/ ./" to the etc/apt/sources.list
When I run apt-get install freenx, it says package not found
Done it, Still getting E: Couldn't find package freenx
Try "apt-caceh search nx" and see what you get
Atom-: Sorry - try "apt-cache search nx" - misspelled above.
Then it seems that the entry in sources.list isn't where those packages reside.
I've put it at the bottom
When I did the update command, I believe I saw that deb entry I added
Right... So lemme find a different tutorial.
kanotix is for all intents and purposes dead now anyway.
